Title: Requires serial numbers to be engraved or stamped on all catalytic converters sold in New York state
Summary: Requires serial numbers to be engraved or stamped on all catalytic converters sold in New York state.
LawCode: Add ยง392-k, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring serial numbers on all catalytic converters sold in New York state
